altername_name: Play With Kappa: Kappa and Forest Friends
name: Kappa-kun to Asobou: Kappa-kun to Mori no Nakamatachi
overview: (Google Translated from Japanese WiiWare page) "Yomikakase picture book" that can be enjoyed with parents and children appeared in Wii wear !! "Kappa-kun and Asobo Kappan-kun Nakamori Nakamas" is a book that allows parents to busy parents to get rid of their picture books so that they can not get tired of their children It is a moving picture book of. There is also an "AIUEO puzzle" to remember Hiragana. Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection Paid service is also available, and additional material is available as a talent's Tomonori Uchikode narration by Ms. Tsunoda Ryoko. Please use by all means when playing with children.
